page.title: 02Eating Out around Horwich
page.content:
Most people in the area use their local{fish and chip shop}as a substitute for home cooked meals. Few people do not use this amenity. Many people also use the{Chinese and Indian {Take-aways.
A small number of households have a completely vegetarian diet but the vast majority have a varied diet.
Within a five mile radius of the town centre there are a variety of eating houses. These include the Beehive{Cavalier Steak House}which is on Chorley New Road, the{Appenzel which is on Babylon Lane about three miles from Horwich and the{Yew Tree which is situated in the Rivington countryside near Horwich.
